lead_paragraph: Corey Pavin birdied his last hole Saturday to shoot a 4-under 68 and take a one-shot lead over close friend Tom Lehman into the final round of the Allianz Championship.

headline.print_headline: Pavin Takes 1-Shot Lead Into Final Round on Champions Tour
headline.main: Pavin Takes 1-Shot Lead Into Final Round on Champions Tour

snippet: Corey Pavin birdied his last hole Saturday to shoot a 4-under 68 and take a one-shot lead over close friend Tom Lehman into the final round of the Allianz Championship....
